verses.verse: In the <S%H8337>six<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%>, <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4438>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, <S%H1115>that<s%> he might not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> any one to go <S%H3318>out<s%> or come <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

There is a <S%H1285>league<s%> between me and <S%H1>thee<s%>, as there was between my father and thy <S%H1>father<s%>: <S%H7971>behold<s%>, I have sent thee <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>; <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H6565>break<s%> thy <S%H1285>league<s%> with <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that he may depart from <S%H5927>me<s%>.

And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of his <S%H2428>armies<s%> against the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H5859>Ijon<s%>, and <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and <S%H66>Abel-maim<s%>, and all the <S%H4543>store<s%> - <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.
And it came to <S%H1201>pass<s%>, when Baasha <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2308>thereof<s%>, that he left off <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and let his <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%>.

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and they carried <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and the <S%H6086>timber<s%> <S%H1201>thereof<s%>, wherewith Baasha had <S%H1129>builded<s%>; and he <S%H1129>built<s%> therewith <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>.

And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8172>him<s%>, Because thou hast relied on the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and hast not <S%H8172>relied<s%> on <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, therefore is the <S%H2428>host<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> out of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Were not the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> and the <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> a <S%H7230>huge<s%> <S%H2428>host<s%>, with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%>? <S%H8172>yet<s%>, because thou didst rely on <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

For the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> throughout the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>, to show himself <S%H2388>strong<s%> in the behalf of them whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H8003>perfect<s%> toward <S%H5528>him<s%>. Herein thou hast done foolishly; for from <S%H6258>henceforth<s%> thou shalt <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4421>wars<s%>.

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H3707>wroth<s%> with the <S%H7200>seer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>prison<s%> - <S%H1004>house<s%>; for he was in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> with him because of this <S%H609>thing<s%>. And Asa <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> at the same <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And <S%H1697><s%>, behold, the acts of <S%H609>Asa<s%>, <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last<s%>, <S%H3789>lo<s%>, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And in the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8672>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H2456>diseased<s%> in his <S%H7272>feet<s%>; his <S%H2483>disease<s%> was <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H2483>great<s%>: yet in his disease he <S%H1875>sought<s%> not to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but to the <S%H7495>physicians<s%>.
And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>.

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%>, which he had <S%H3738>hewn<s%> out for himself in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him in the <S%H4904>bed<s%> which was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with sweet <S%H1314>odors<s%> and divers <S%H2177>kinds<s%> of spices <S%H7543>prepared<s%> by the <S%H4842>perfumers<s%>' <S%H4639>art<s%>: and they <S%H8313>made<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> burning for <S%H8316>him<s%>.
